description.@en: I’ve spent so much time at my lathe and saw that I can whip together or patch up anything made of wood in no time.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You always Critically Succeed Tradecraft Skill Tests to create objects larger than an oxen.
